text:
Hi Guys I have created the private app with webhooks where I have used the subscriptions

1. Deal object 
2. Property change  
3. property name: deal stage
when the deal stage will be changed webhook 3rd party url will be fired but the problem is it fired automatically and fire multiple times when I change the deal stage once .

How I can resolve this ?

*Form thank you message*

Is there any way to add buttons or any custom HTML to thank you messages on Forms?
I only see a very simple text editor there.
I'd want to add buttons, drop down fields etc.

P.S. I know we could just redirect to another page but I'd want to try it on the same page without redirection.

Hey Everyone! Excited to announce that <https://tools.hubteam.com/launch/feature-rollouts/147888/info|Webhook Triggers> are now live in Operations Hub Pro+!  :spider_web::hook::yay:

Webhook Triggers provide customers with the flexibility to pull data in from third party systems/apps to trigger workflows directly in HubSpot!!! :partying_face:
Thanks so much <@U01QVR44MEY>. That works, appreciate your help!
